name: File Restore
description: Restores user profile data from network backup. Supports protocol URL for one-click restore from email links.
author: Justin Garcia

parameters.name: Path
parameters.description: Backup folder path. If empty, shows folder browser.

parameters.name: WhatIf
parameters.description: Dry run - shows what would be restored

parameters.name: Verbose
parameters.description: Shows detailed debug logging in console output

parameters.name: PromptForDeletion
parameters.description: Prompt to delete backup after restore
